Lol, again, NTR like this one is crafted so that it moves the story forward. From start to finish, it was DESIGNED this way to show the hot sex scenes, to show the NTR happening, to show the 'doomed fate' of the characters. Some folks here read this and start to bring in comparisons with reality and "what if" scenarios to resolve their issues. If you read all four parts (Closet 0-2, Mom chapter) you'd see the story was purposely DESIGNED (and not without flaws), parts of which will have you "uh, WTF" or "seriously? you dumbass!" or "haha you fucking dumb bitch!". Now here is my review: story still has a shit tons of hentai logic (sry not gonna list them, there's too many and will be an essay long tl;dr boring shit), but the art is passable at a few parts but thankfully the best arts of this artist are in some of the sex scenes which I really liked a lot. Overall, this is worthy of my favorite.

I agreed with MC for the first two parts of the story since he was giving Rinka the benefit of the doubt. Of course we the audience know that she was long gone way before this  but MC didn't know that, it was still reasonable even if extremely weak. However in this part of the story, NTR-kun straight up tells MC that he's been fucking Rinka since before MC knew it and that MC was not making his move on her even though she wanted it, which is absolutely true on top of being very logical. It was foolish of MC to think he could do nothing and somehow succeed with Rinka. I feel that after this exchange, the  MC completely lost all legitimacy and it only got worse from there.  There's weak, stupid and cowardly MCs and then there's this guy that makes those guys look badass by comparison.

@VermillionB Netori is different, it's more focused to mc(hero) had been stolen by other main antagonist from mc(heroine). In the first place, the term of ntr(netorare) only existed. Simply put netori are the opposite of netorare which is the heroine had been stolen by other antagonist. Things like these, got more 'celebration' which is why more author will make ntr doujin/manga to gain more buyer(in Japan ofc). Why? This whole stuff happened to me. I got played like a damn fiddle, even then I opened my heart to keep loving her but ultimately I got discarded straight to the face. I love NTR so much because it helps me understand in a twisted way of the many things that I got lied about. Scenarios, expressions, dialogue... it all adds up in my mind to recreate these events that crushed my life and crippled me emotionally forever. The girl eventually had her karma get to her and my life is pretty good right now. Sadly I could never get myself to get a girlfriend anymore. I've become a twisted person myself. I feel like I'd ruin someone's life by mistake if I get involved in a relationship. This series get to me so much, probably if we pair it with https://nhentai.net/g/127189/ that would give a nice example of some of the many ugly things that happened around me. Sometimes tears drop as I cum to these stories because it reminds me of a certain happiness I lack now. But even then, I've never hated her
